concept.title: What is Scratch
concept.shortdesc: Scratch is a free visual programming language with code blocks to create animations, digital stories etc.

conbody.p: Scratch was designed to provide free coding platform for young children. However, it is used by people of all age group. It is available in more than 70 languages. Learning is fun with Scratch.

Some of the benefits using Scratch are:
Develop problem solving skills
Promotes computational skills
Creative thinking
Self expression and collaboration
